chunk_prompt: Summarize this content about Breast infection/sepsis symptoms:
final_prompt: Summarize this content about Breast infection/sepsis symptoms:

sentences.text: apparently a stroke is not always accompanied by the other well known symptoms.
my mom had 3 strokes this way.
no typical signs just a severe headache then a bloodshot eye with the first.
about 9 months later she complained of a severe headache and declined my offer to take her to the er.
sudden hearing loss in one ear.
if it doesn't recover within a few hours, get yourself to er immediately.
you have about 24-26 hours during which treatment can bring your hearing back.
one pupil is dilated while the other is normal.

chunks.raw_summary: A stroke is not always accompanied by the other well known symptoms such as a bloodshot eye . Symptoms include a severe headache, sudden hearing loss in one ear and a dilated pupil .
chunks.cleaned_summary: A stroke is not always accompanied by the other well known symptoms such as a bloodshot eye. Symptoms include a severe headache, sudden hearing loss in one ear and a dilated pupil.
